creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Warp-twined (LM) band. Pieced red and green wool flannel ground with polychrome silk embroidery. There is a block printed cotton substrate beneath the wool. The top edge and the upper four inches of the PR edge retain a narrow embroidered silk finishing band. The remaining edges are raw. There is no backing. Center shield-shaped design surrounded border. Embroidered through backing. Chain stitch.
title: Uuk kap ilgich
